title: Team Profile Generator
description: This application is built using Node.js. It takes in information from user and generates a HTML file.

title: README Generator
description: This application is built using Node.js. It creates a README file using user inputs.

title: Password Generator
description: This application is built using Javascript, CSS and HTML. Browser based password generator app which generates a random passowrd based on user inputs.

title: Code Quiz Game
description: This application is built using Javascript, CSS and HTML. A quiz game in which player answers as many code related questions as they can before the time runs out!

title: Weather-dashboard
description: This application is built using Javascript, jQuery, Bootstrap, CSS and HTML. Weather dashboard for a city of users choice.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: This application is built using Moment.js, Javascript, jQuery, Bootstrap, CSS and HTML. Simple calendar Application that allows user to save events for each hour of the day.
